description: Earl Tyrant is the main antagonist of Final Fantasy: Unlimited and the ruler of Wonderland. though he has the appearance of a spoiled child, the Earl is actually an avatar of Chaos, the entity that attacked the worlds that Wonderland is composed of. The Earl enforces his iron-fisted rule of Wonderland through his four Lords of Gaudium, installing negative emotions among minon and denizen alike for nourishment while going after the pieces of Omega to become a god and rule all existence.
name: Tyrant Hakushaku
